attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Compensate all VAT Registered businesses with a proposed amount of  £750 for the upheaval created by the reduction in VAT from 17.5% to 15% which has failed to stimulate the economy and failed to help business yet has created unnecessary work for many businesses struggling to survive current economic downturn and protect jobs

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
